description:
As the sports festival comes down to the wire, Horikita must deal with Sudo, as well as Ryuen`s threat.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adversity Is the First Path to Truth.
Gyakkyou wa Shinjitsu e to Itaru Saisho no Michisuji de Aru.
L’adversité est la route qui conduit le plus sûrement à la vérité.
逆境は真実へと至る最初の道筋である.
